bibl.title: The Rise of the Mercenaries in the Third Century.
bibl.note: 1. The [---] Xenia Barbarike and its numerus Orientalium in Egypt in AD 203. P. Flor. II, 278; P. Mich. VII, 454. - 2. Salarati Peregrini as Mailed Horsemen in Egypt in 267. P. Oxy. XLI, 2951. - 3. Sal[arati?] at Dura Europos in 251. P. Dura 97.
Speidel Michael P., The Rise of the Mercenaries in the Third Century.
